files.description: Runnable Python CLI script that creates/overwrites outputs/RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md and outputs/RIGHTS_LOG.csv with the required fields and sensible starter content.
Single module containing the canonical markdown checklist template and CSV header/seed row builders used by the generator script to ensure consistent output.
Generated markdown checklist covering rights and licensing verification steps, attribution requirements, and reviewer sign-off guidance for assets.
Generated CSV log template with columns asset_id,url,rightsholder,license type,usage permissions,attribution text,restrictions,verification date,reviewer for tracking permissions per asset.
Project usage documentation explaining how to run the generator script and what files it creates under outputs/.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md and /outputs/RIGHTS_LOG.csv (fields: asset_id, url, rightsholder, license type, usage permissions, attribution text, restrictions, verification date, reviewer).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Reduces legal/operational risk by establishing a rights workflow for images/audio/video, which is essential to responsibly catalog exemplars without downloading copyrighted material....
projectName: /outputs/RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md and /outputs/RIGHTS_LOG.csv (fields: asset_id, url, rightsholder, license type, usage permissions, attribution text, restrictions, verification date, reviewer).
